name: brawlTartarusObjects
description:
Modified Tartarus Town objects used by template Brawl, should be better suited for short games on small maps.
Quasit Cache: 5x 10-20 Ice Spawns, reward: 2-4 Mercury, 500-1000 Gold, 4 Ice Golems/3 Furies/2 Frost Creepers/1 Arachnid,
Bloody Tower: 3-6 Furies and Stygain Furies, 2-5 Succubi and Lilims (from Tides of War mod), reward: 600-1200 Gold, 2-7 Mercury and Sulfur.
All creatures that have upgrades, both guards and rewards have a chance of being upgraded.
All banks recharge after 4 full days pass.
They are not designed to be taken with your whole army but with parts of your army in multiple places at once.
author: Warzyw647

chinese.name: Brawl模板冰狱城镇小物件
chinese.description:
专为Brawl模板定制的改良版冰狱城镇物件，适用于小型地图。
夸赛特宝藏：5队每队10-20恶灵仆从守卫，奖励2-4水银、500-1000金币、4冰傀儡/3女妖/2寒冰守卫/1魔蛛。
血腥之塔：4队守卫，其中女妖和冥河女妖各3-6个，魅魔和艳魔各2-5个，奖励600-1200金币、水银和硫磺各2-7份。
所有可升级的生物，无论是守卫还是奖励生物，都可能出现升级后的生物。
所有宝屋每4天刷新一次。
这些物件不是设计来让你用全部兵力去攻打的，而是让你分散成多支小股部队同时攻打多处地点。
